**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 595 4.0 **Usage** held in 1 hand --- A glass orb atop this metal staff contains fine, undulating sand. While wielding the staff, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to checks to identify transmutation magic. **Craft Requirements** Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells. Staff of Transmutation **Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 595 4.0 **Price** 230 gp **Bulk** 1 ---
  • **Cantrip** [_sigil_](/Spells.aspx?ID=286)
  • **1st** [_fleet step_](/Spells.aspx?ID=122), [_jump_](/Spells.aspx?ID=167)
  • **2nd** [_enlarge_](/Spells.aspx?ID=102), [_humanoid form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=153)
Staff of Transmutation (Greater) **Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 595 4.0 **Price** 900 gp **Bulk** 1 ---
  • **3rd** [_feet to fins_](/Spells.aspx?ID=113), _jump_
  • **4th** [_gaseous form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=129), [_shape stone_](/Spells.aspx?ID=276)
Staff of Transmutation (Major) **Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 595 4.0 **Price** 4,000 gp **Bulk** 1 ---
  • **5th** _humanoid transformation_
  • **6th** [_baleful polymorph_](/Spells.aspx?ID=17), [_dragon form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=88), [_flesh to stone_](/Spells.aspx?ID=123)
name: Staff of Transmutation (Greater)
